meta.name: description
meta.content: Commerce City Schools, Commerce, Georgia. The purpose of Commerce City Schools is to be a respected charter system of high achieving schools with shared governance providing a safe environment and engaging students in learning experiences that will prepare them for post-secondary options and a healthy, productive life.
